title: The Strongman Vladimir Putin and the Struggle for Russia by Angu
description:
Former BBC Moscow correspondent Angus Roxburgh charts the dramatic fight for 
RussiaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s future under Vladimir PutinÃ¢â‚¬â€how the former KGB man changed from 
reformer to autocrat; how he sought the WestÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s respect but earned its fear; 
how he cracked down on his rivals at home and burnished a flamboyant 
personality cult, one day saving snow leopards or horseback riding bare 
chested, the next tongue-lashing Western audiences. Drawing on dozens of 
exclusive interviews in Russia, where he worked as a Kremlin insider 
advising Putin on press relations, Roxburgh also argues that the West threw 
away chances to bring Russia in from the cold by failing to understand its 
fears and aspirations following the collapse of communism.

The Strongman: Vladimir Putin and the Struggle for Russia
By: Angus Roxburgh
